name: Infinix!
description:
Hello there!! This is my FIRST game.. I was gonna make this for a gamejam which needed an endless mode. 

In this game you are in control of a rocket in outerspace dodging meteors!

There are 3 powerups in this game!

Explore their abilities and create very crazy plays!!

Once you get pass 50points things get very crazy...

If you get 100points or more you are considered better than the guy who made this game because my highest is 96 for now lol
